email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 01/22/2001 02:06 PM --------------------------- From: Travis McCullough on 01/22/2001 01:48 PM CST To: Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: Response to PGE request for gas Draft response to PGE -- do you have any comments? Have you run it by Phillip Allen?
